title: 9 - Examine Before You Fight (9.4.12)
description: A discussion of the clarinet and nine eleven is briefly interrupted by an amazing D&D adventure before proceeding into an indictment of the Hugo Awards and concluding with a demonstration of how hard it is to conclude.
nextTitle: 10 - A Tuppence or a Shilling for Your Wainscotting (9.10.12)
